title: Chocolate apple sauce cake
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '2 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder', '1 1/2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '110g butter', '300g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '500g unsweetened apple sauce', '170g plain chocolate chips']
